text: Tritia caboverdensis is a species of sea snail, a marine gastropod mollusk in the family Nassariidae, the Nassa mud snails or dog whelks. ==Description== The length of the shell varies between 8 mm and 18 mm. ==Distribution== This species occurs in the Atlantic Ocean off the Cape Verde Islands. ==References== * Rolán E., 2005. Malacological Fauna From The Cape Verde Archipelago. Part 1, Polyplacophora and Gastropoda. ==External links== * caboverdensis Category:Gastropods of Cape Verde Category:Endemic fauna of Cape Verde Category:Gastropods described in 1884
title: Tritia caboverdensis
